title: Text Tools
content:
**[Indices](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Indices): [Tools](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Tools): Text Tools**

**Text Generators**  
 [adhesiontext](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/adhesiontext)  
 [Designers Toolbox](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/www.designerstoolbox.com/)  
 [Greeking Machine](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Greeking%20Machine)  
 [Just Another Test Text Generator](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/justanotherfoundry.com/tools/generator/)  
 [Typeable](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/urtd.net/projects/typable/)  
 [Lero-Lero](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/www.padrelevedo.hpg.ig.com.br/lerolero/LeroLero.html)  
 [lipServiceX](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/www.iworkcommunity.com/modules.php?name=Downloads&d_op=viewdownload&cid=11)  
 [LittleIpsum — Latin Text Generator for Mac OS X](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/littleipsum.com/)  
 [Lipsum](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Lipsum)  
 [Lorem Ipsum Content Generator](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/www.roundtwo.com/product/contentgenerator)  
 [MacLorem](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/judebear.daveward.net/MacLorem)  
 [malevole](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/www.malevole.com/mv/misc/text/)  
 [Perbang](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/lorem-ipsum.perbang.dk/)  
 [Pseudo-Czech Dummy Text](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/wellstyled.com/tools/dummy-cz/)  
 [Random Text Generator](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/johno.jsmf.net/knowhow/ngrams/)  
 [Subterrane](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/www.subterrane.com/loremipsum.shtml)  
 [The Motherlode](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/The%20Motherlode)  
 [Turkey](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/turkey.davi.cz/)  
 [Ungreek](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/ungreek.toolbot.com/)  
 [Stringmaker](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/ninastoessinger.com/stringmaker/)  
 [Bullshit Ipsum](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/bullshitipsum.com/)

**Text Analysers**  
 [LetterMeter](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/LetterMeter)  
 [Text Analyser](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Text%20Analyser)

**Frequency Statistics**  
 [Brendan's Language Page](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/www.ultrasw.com/pawlowski/brendan/index.html)  
 [Character Frequency in Multilingual Corpus](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/www.characterfrequency.com/)  
 [Word Frequency and Letter Frequency in the English Language](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/deafandblind.com/word_frequency.htm)

**Databases**  
 [Letter database](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Letter%20database) see also [Diacritical](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Diacritical), [Accent Mark](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Accent%20Mark) and [Encodings](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/typophile.com/wiki/Encodings)

**Discussion:**  
 [Custom Lipsum](http://web.archive.org/web/20130806004753/http:/typophile.com/node/53495)
author: Miguel Sousa
